translations: 天真的，幼稚的；（艺术风格）朴素的，原始的；缺乏阅历的，轻信他人的

sentences.sentence: Their approach to life is refreshingly naive.
sentences.translation: 他们对待生活的态度天真率直，令人耳目一新。

sentences.sentence: Their view was that he had been politically naive.
sentences.translation: 他们的看法是，他在政治上曾是幼稚的。

sentences.sentence: I can't believe you were so naive as to trust him!
sentences.translation: 真是难以相信你会幼稚到信任他！
